sentences.english: If the detection is suddenly sexual bald-headed, please seek dermatologist.

sentences.english: Intense Moisture Cream is clinically proven mild, thoroughly tested by dermatologists , and allergy-tested. Johnsons Brand is pediatrician recommended.

sentences.english: If you find a sudden bald spot, see your dermatologist.

sentences.english: As an admissions expert, he was employed by the Shanghai Armed Police Corps Hospital of Dermatology.

sentences.english: Clearly Natural Rainforest Glycerin Bar Soap is hypo-allergenic and dermatologist recommended.

sentences.english: Recently, the area what virtuous hospital dermatology department had accepted the little girl who scalds .

sentences.english: Cryopen is a breakthrough in aesthetic surgery and dermatology.

sentences.english: I can use this product in place of the shampoos recommended by the dermatologist with much better control of visible flaking of the scalp.

sentences.english: N: I think you should see a dermatoloist first.
